mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE VALUES (SEQ_EMP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{posNo}, #{deptNo}, #{empName}, #{empGender}, #{empPhone}, #{empSal}, #{empEmail}, TO_DATE(#{empHiredate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), null, #{empSsc}, #{empDegree}, #{empCareer}, TO_CHAR(SEQ_EMP_NO.NEXTVAL, 'FM99999999'), #{empRePhoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPhoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empMil})
